Watch More Videos Faster. Get Instant Transcriptions of Your Favourite YouTube Videos.

5 Reasons You Will Love YT Scribe:

Transform YouTube videos into text:
📄 Instant transcripts: Scan content fast
⏱️ Time-coded: Jump to any part
🧠 AI-punctuated: Easy reading and copy
💾 SRT downloads: Edit or add subtitles

🤔 Why YT Scribe?
⏩ Save time: 10x faster content consumption 
🧠 Better understanding: Watch + read
🔍 Miss nothing: Searchable transcripts

What does this extension do?

It adds a small "Get Transcript" blue link right under your YouTube video. Simply click this to get the transcript.

This is must-have chrome extension. Imagine you're watching a 1 hour podcast on YouTube? Or you need the transcript for work. This is the perfect tool to get transcripts of your videos.

You won't be believe how useful it is! 

Install it today, it's free!
